default.title: Magic Snapshot Mug, 11 oz
default.description: Abracadabra! Amaze your friends with this 11-ounce mug that appears black until filled with hot water, revealing a tiled design of a favorite photo!

en_US.description: Abracadabra! Amaze your friends with this 11-ounce mug that appears black until filled with hot water, revealing a tiled design of a favorite photo!
